00241 #if defined( _EMU_EM4CONF_MASK )
00242 #define EMU_EM4INIT_DEFAULT                                                                \
00243 {                                                                                          \
00244   false,                              /* Dont't lock configuration after it's been set */  \
00245   false,                              /* No reset will be asserted due to Brownout when in EM4 */ \
00246   emuEM4Osc_ULFRCO,                   /* Use default ULFRCO oscillator  */                 \
00247   true,                               /* Wake up on EM4 BURTC interrupt */                 \
00248   true,                               /* Enable VREG */                                    \
00249 }
00250 #endif
00251 #if defined( _EMU_EM4CTRL_MASK )
00252 #define EMU_EM4INIT_DEFAULT                                                                \
00253 {                                                                                          \
00254   false,                             /* Retain LFXO configuration upon EM4 entry */        \
00255   false,                             /* Retain LFRCO configuration upon EM4 entry */       \
00256   false,                             /* Retain ULFRCO configuration upon EM4 entry */      \
00257   emuEM4Shutoff,                                                                           \
00258 }
00259 #endif

00290 
00292 #define EMU_BUPDINIT_DEFAULT                                              \
00293 {                                                                         \
00294   emuProbe_Disable, /* Do not enable voltage probe */                     \
00295   false,            /* Disable BOD calibration mode */                    \
00296   false,            /* Disable BU_STAT pin for backup mode indication */  \
00297                                                                           \
00298   emuRes_Res0,      /* RES0 series resistance between main and backup power */ \
00299   false,            /* Don't enable strong switch */                           \
00300   false,            /* Don't enable medium switch */                           \
00301   false,            /* Don't enable weak switch */                             \
00302                                                                                \
00303   emuPower_None,    /* No connection between main and backup power (inactive mode) */     \
00304   emuPower_None,    /* No connection between main and backup power (active mode) */       \
00305   true              /* Enable BUPD enter on BOD, enable BU_VIN pin, release BU reset  */  \
00306 }
00307 #endif

00341 __STATIC_INLINE void EMU_EnterEM1(void)
00342 {
00343   /* Just enter Cortex-M3 sleep mode */
00344   SCB->SCR &= ~SCB_SCR_SLEEPDEEP_Msk;
00345   __WFI();
00346 }

00478 __STATIC_INLINE void EMU_EM4Lock(bool enable)
00479 {
00480   BUS_RegBitWrite(&(EMU->EM4CONF), _EMU_EM4CONF_LOCKCONF_SHIFT, enable);
00481 }

00485 /***************************************************************************/
00489 __STATIC_INLINE void EMU_BUReady(void)
00490 {
00491   while(!(EMU->STATUS & EMU_STATUS_BURDY))
00492     ;
00493 }

00565 __STATIC_INLINE void EMU_EM2Block(void)
